title: SEAFORT ORB / full faln set
description: test case orb for wearing the full faln set if you have all of the items.

dialogueTree.title: Composure: "O glorious Falnier! You wear the fu..."
dialogueTree.text: O glorious Falnier! You wear the full set like a true-born hero. The *ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE* of FALN flows in you.

links.title: Composure: "You are the most *Ultra* of men. Pe..."
links.text: You are the most *Ultra* of men. Peak performance!

links.title: Composure: "Go on! The fucking sunset awaits, F..."
links.text: Go on! The fucking sunset awaits, FALN rider!

links.title: Composure: "You are Next Century personified, t..."
links.text: You are Next Century personified, the synthetic man!

links.title: You: "It's like I can do anything. *ANYTH..."
links.text: It's like I can do anything. *ANYTHING*!

links.title: Composure: "You are literally untouchable. A go..."
links.text: You are literally untouchable. A god among mere men.
